{{- /* fake go:code */ -}} {{ }} {{ .Age }} {{ $ := 12 }} {{ $ := "12" }} {{ . := 12 }} {{ . = 12 }} {{ . }} {{ dell }} {{ diction }} {{ dd "hell" }} {{ dict "hellen" "output" }} {{ dict "hellen" 12 }} {{ dict "hellen" 12.3 }} // must through an error since 12.3 is a 'float' rather than an 'int' {{ 23 | dict 44 }} {{ dict "222" 23 }} {{ brandon "mis" }} {{ $dict := "hello" }} {{ $new.num := 23 }} {{ $dict.num := 23 }} {{ $dict.num = 23 }} {{ $dict "jjjj" }} {{ $dict }} {{ dict }} {{ dandelion }} {{ $var := "hello" }} {{ $var = 23 }} {{ $var }} {{ $ := "elton" }} // this one right here should be a big no-no, redefining $ is not good (analysis) although it is valid syntax {{ $. := "elton" }} should through an error as well (bad syntax) {{ $.angolmoi }} // should not through an error if '$' stills refer to initial input (only linting error is possible, not syntax error) {{ $.ban }} {{ $.planet := "elton" }} // must through an error {{ $.planet = "elton" }} // must through an error because of the assignment {{ .planet = "hello" }} // must through an error {{ .$ }} source = ` {{ concat (((upper "world") )"--breaker" }} `. The previous text is valid under html/template rule, make it pass {{- /*go:codes func dandelion(int) int */ -}} {{ }} {{ dandelion }} {{ | }} {{ $ }} {{ jor := "jd" }} {{ $val := "hello" }} {{ $val := "the storm" }} {{ . }} {{ template "rickus" . }} {{ define "rickus" }} {{/* go:code type Input struct { name string age int dd } func mortal() string func () func mikey() */}} {{ $val := "calco" }} {{ $val }} {{ $ }} {{ . }} {{ end }} {{ $val }} {{ define "rickus" }} {{ end }} {{ template "rickus" . }} {{ define "tonton" .Pal }} {{ define "uncle" }} {{/* go:code type Input struct { city string } */}} {{ end }} {{ end }} {{ define "benso" }} {{ define "aunt" }} {{ end }} {{ $ }} {{ $ = 34 }} {{ $ = 34 }} {{ end }} {{ template "uncle" . }} {{ template "aunt" . }} {{ template "laptop" . }} {{ if ((true)) }} {{ define "tata" }} {{ end }} {{ getName "dd" }} {{ end }} {{ template "tonton" . }} {{ template "tata" . }} {{ dict "steveen" 23 }} {{ 23 | dict "steveen" }} {{ dict = "hell" }} {{/*s go:code func getName(name b) */}} {{/* go:code var nam string type Input struct { Name string Age int City string } func (i Input) banana() string func (i Input) GetName() string func (i *Input) SetName(string) int var melo int func halo(, ) func diction() // func dict (string, a int) string func dict (string, int) (string, error) func ddd(dd) func dd(d djd d) func maso(_) func bro(_, _ string) string var nanomachine func(name string, exp int) int */}} {{ template "meborne" . }} {{ $megan := "Meg" }} {{ }} {{ $megan }} {{ dict }} {{ diction }} {{ nanomachine }}
